0.name: January Snowball Fight
0.description:
January. The freezing month in the middle of winter.
What better way to celebrate the cold start of the new year but by holding a snowball fight!
**Prizes:**
1st place: 50000 mimicoinz
2nd place: 25000 mimicoinz
3rd place: 10000 mimicoinz
Participation prize: 1000 mimicoinz
 Good luck!
**Command list:**
**!collect** - collect one item to use
**!throw** - throw a snowball at someone (50% chance of success)
**!eventlb** - display current event leaderboard
**!eventstats** - display your (or someone else's) event stats
**!eventinfo** - display this message
0.onactiontrue: Oh my, you hit quite hard. **1 point** added for style!
0.onactionfalse: Oops, you missed (and by a lot)

1.name: February Valentines Gifting
1.description:
The moth of love is here!<3
Show your true love by gifting chocolate to your favourite people!
**Prizes:**
1st place: 50000 mimicoinz
2nd place: 25000 mimicoinz
3rd place: 10000 mimicoinz
Participation prize: 1000 mimicoinz
 Good luck!
**Command list:**
**!collect** - collect one item to use
**!offer** - offer a token of love to someone (50% chance of success)
**!eventlb** - display current event leaderboard
**!eventstats** - display your (or someone else's) event stats
**!eventinfo** - display this message
1.onactiontrue: Oh my, they are blushing. I would take that as a yes. **1 point**
1.onactionfalse: Oh snap, they already have a loved one...

2.name: March Flower Giving
2.description:
The days are longer; the weater is hotter.
Spring is here, and with it the first flowers are starting to bloom! Offer them to someone as a lucky charm and win some money while you're at it!
**Prizes:**
1st place: 50000 mimicoinz
2nd place: 25000 mimicoinz
3rd place: 10000 mimicoinz
Participation prize: 1000 mimicoinz
 Good luck!
**Command list:**
**!collect** - collect one item to use
**!offer** - offer a flower to someone (50% chance of success)
**!eventlb** - display current event leaderboard
**!eventstats** - display your (or someone else's) event stats
**!eventinfo** - display this message
2.onactiontrue: That is quite a good looking one, I must admit. **1 point**
2.onactionfalse: Oops, it seems your flower has wilted...

3.name: April Cherry Blossom Viewing
3.description:
April has arrived.
All around Japan the cherry blossom trees are starting to show their beautiful colours.
Take someone by the hand and watch the great temporary display of colour and beauty!
**Prizes:**
1st place: 50000 mimicoinz
2nd place: 25000 mimicoinz
3rd place: 10000 mimicoinz
Participation prize: 1000 mimicoinz
 Good luck!
**Command list:**
**!collect** - collect one item to use
**!show** - show a beautiful cherry blossom to someone (50% chance of success)
**!eventlb** - display current event leaderboard
**!eventstats** - display your (or someone else's) event stats
**!eventinfo** - display this message
3.onactiontrue: A fine example of the beautiful and delciate flower! **1 point**
3.onactionfalse: I think they saw something far better than that...

4.description:

**!eventinfo** - display this message
4.onactiontrue: They accepted, time to dance! **1 point**
4.onactionfalse: They didn't really like the band...

8.name: September Campfires
8.description:

11.name: December Gift Giving
11.description:
